page.title: 14Our School Computer Class 5
page.content: Our school has a Research Machines Link 480Z computer and a single disc drive. We have just had a sponsored spell to raise money to buy a Turtle and a printer. Each class has the computer in their room for about two double periods a week. We do all kinds of programs such as Arrow which is a logo program and Tiles in which we have to work out how many squares it would take to fill in the gaps in certain letters. We also have a program to help work out our Athletics Awards. Over half of us have a computer at home The most popular ones are Sinclair ZX Spectrum and Commodore 64. We use them for educational programs like Missing Words, decision programs like Osprey and Ring of Power and also for game programs. The two most popular games are Jet Set Willy and Pac Man.
